text: 10. The production method according to any one of claims 5 to 8, wherein in the step (4), the residence time of the materials in the reaction tank is maintained at 4 to 5 hours by controlling the feed flow rates of the soluble mixed salt aqueous solution, the strong alkali solution and the aqueous ammonia; in the step (5), the particle size D50 of the secondary particle agglomerates detected is 9-15 Î¼m.
